## Features Demonstrated

The demo showcases:

### ðŸŽ¯ Core Features
- **Local AI Chat**: Privacy-first conversations with Ollama models
- **Document RAG**: Query your local documents with AI-powered search
- **Voice Input**: Speech-to-text using Whisper
- **Voice Output**: Text-to-speech responses
- **Streamlit UI**: Clean, intuitive web interface

### ðŸ”’ Privacy & Security
- **100% Offline**: No data leaves your machine
- **Local Models**: All processing happens on your device
- **No Tracking**: Zero telemetry or data collection

### ðŸš€ Performance
- **Fast Response**: Optimized for local inference
- **Memory Efficient**: Smart model loading and caching
- **Cross-Platform**: Works on macOS, Linux, and Windows

## Quick Start

1. **Install Ollama**: Download from [ollama.com](https://ollama.com)
2. **Clone & Setup**:
   ```bash
   git clone https://github.com/koushal13/WhisperMind.git
   cd WhisperMind
   pip install -r requirements.txt
   ```
3. **Run**: `python launch.py`
4. **Browse**: Open http://localhost:8501

## Use Cases

- **Personal Knowledge Base**: Query your documents, notes, and files
- **Voice Assistant**: Hands-free interaction with your AI
- **Research Helper**: Get insights from your research papers and documents
- **Privacy-First AI**: Enjoy AI capabilities without cloud dependencies
